title: 尋找HIM的故事`二
txt_content:
今次難好多了

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content:
孩子。。。。我只想说。。。。
没有眼睛你找个毛啊

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 啊，在右上角，突然看到了。。。

replies.author: dreamsun
replies.txt_content: 只突出半隻眼睛..........注意力被中間那堆人給分散了 =[]=

replies.author: nic148
replies.txt_content:
更難嗎...
找到的時間和上次一樣...
不用1秒.
sosad=d

replies.author: jingli159
replies.txt_content: 哈哈.有趣有趣!.大家找找看

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content: 这次比上次多用5秒钟时间去找

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 对了LZ可以把图放大一点，多一点人。。。

replies.author: zjhs999
replies.txt_content:
还是好容易。。。。
木偶MOD
无趣
- -

replies.author: dantebelmondo
replies.txt_content: 宇智波佐助的皮膚不錯

replies.author: zdyxiaokeai
replies.txt_content: 我看了评论才找到的啊啊啊啊啊....

replies.author: 路邊電燈泡
replies.txt_content: 這次還是1秒鐘，只是晃過去就看到了= =

replies.author: ERBem
replies.txt_content: 怎么还有.....还是很明显，右上角

replies.author: 麝月箭矢CGT
replies.txt_content: 自从知道了HIM的存在，每天晚上睡觉总觉得HIM就在楼下（我家盖了个三层小楼，hi hi）

麝月箭矢CGT 发表于 2011-10-14 16:15
